allow: Bash(cd D:/Emulators/CRT-Unified-Launcher && python crt_tools.py display dump 2>&1)

Bash(cd /d/Emulators/CRT-Unified-Launcher && python -c "
import xml.etree.ElementTree as ET, sys

ra_id = '5ab34523-f773-4f9b-8fbb-eb93db2f3bfb'

# Platforms.xml has per-platform emulator associations with command lines
tree = ET.parse\(r'D:\\Emulators\\LaunchBox\\Data\\Platforms.xml'\)
root = tree.getroot\(\)
for child in root:
    if child.tag != 'EmulatorPlatform':
        continue
    eid = child.findtext\('EmulatorId'\) or ''
    if ra_id not in eid:
        continue
    d = {c.tag: c.text for c in child if c.text}
    sys.stdout.buffer.write\(\(str\(d\) + '\\n'\).encode\('utf-8'\)\)
" 2>&1)

Bash(cd /d/Emulators/CRT-Unified-Launcher && python -c "
import xml.etree.ElementTree as ET, sys

# What node types exist in Platforms.xml?
tree = ET.parse\(r'D:\\Emulators\\LaunchBox\\Data\\Platforms.xml'\)
root = tree.getroot\(\)
tags = {}
for child in root:
    tags[child.tag] = tags.get\(child.tag, 0\) + 1
print\(tags\)
" 2>&1)
